title: Views of Las Vegas, Complimentary WiFi in Clubhouse, Modern Aesthetic
posting_body: 8760 W Patrick Lane, Las Vegas, NV, 89148
Use this link for more details:
Luxury Apartments for Rent in Las Vegas, NV
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1.5 Bath, approximately 1103 Sq.
Live in style at EVO Apartments.
Only minutes from Downtown Summerlin, NV, our spacious one, two and three bedroom apartments and lofts have been thoughtfully crafted to provide you the desert oasis you deserve.
We offer our residents an impressive selection of amenities and facilities.
Relax around our resort-inspired rooftop pool or soak in the infinity edge Jacuzzi overlooking the Las Vegas Strip and mountains.
Enjoy spin classes, yoga, Pilates or work on your three point shot in our indoor basketball court.
Head up to the second floor spa and fitness center for a cardio workout followed by some time in our sauna and steam rooms.
EVO offers a choice of pet-friendly or pet-free apartments for rent in southwest Las Vegas.
We have options for all of your needs.
If you do have a pet, we invite you to bring your furry friend to the community dog park after stopping by your EVO leasing office for their treat!
